function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overcrowded apartments","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission due to close proximity and limited space for distancing","Mitigation":"Implement policies to reduce overcrowding, provide support for affordable housing, and promote sustainable urban planning","Technologies":"Urban planning and architectural design to optimize living space","People":"Poor and vulnerable populations, including children, the elderly, and low-income individuals","Owner":"Government, urban planners, housing authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate apartments with structural issues","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission due to inadequate ventilation and dampness","Mitigation":"Improving building infrastructure, enforcing building codes, and providing subsidies for repairs","Technologies":"Building materials for better ventilation, structural repair technologies, and monitoring systems for indoor air quality","People":"Residents of affected buildings","Owner":"Building owners, property management, and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of essential amenities in apartments","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission due to poor sanitation and hygiene practices","Mitigation":"Infrastructure improvement, providing access to clean water, sanitation, and heating facilities","Technologies":"Water treatment and heating systems, sanitation infrastructure, and public health education programs","People":"Residents of apartments without essential amenities","Owner":"Government, utility providers, and property owners"}]}
